Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Amphipathic peptide CT1 (VsCT1; Non-disulfide-bridged peptide 5.11, NDBP-5.11)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the scorpion NDBP 5 family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Swiss_Prot Entry I0DEB5]No antibacterial activity even at 50 µM
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.22342498]10% hemolytic activity at 10 μM and 50 μM against human erythrocytes
Sequence Information.Function: Amphipatic peptide that shows no antibacterial activity even at 50 uM but shows hemolytic activity against human erythrocytes.

Literature.Title: Gene cloning and functional characterization of four novel antimicrobial-like peptides from scorpions of the family Vaejovidae.
Literature.Author: Ramírez-Carreto S, Quintero-Hernández V, Jiménez-Vargas JM, Corzo G, Possani LD, Becerril B, Ortiz E.
